block.p: Marilyn Elizabeth LaMarche and Stephen Allen Mandell were married yesterday at Temple Emanu-El in New York by Rabbi Amy Ehrlich. The bride is the daughter of the late Mr. and Mrs. Bert M. Ward of New York. The bridegroom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Mandell of Chestnut Hill, Mass. The bride is a general partner of the New York investment banking firm of Lazard Freres & Co. She is a graduate of the City College of New York and of the Harvard-Radcliffe Program of Business Administration at Harvard University. Mr. Mandell, who is a private investor, has an undergraduate degree and an M.B.A. degree from Harvard. His previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bride's.

Marilyn Elizabeth LaMarche and Stephen Allen Mandell were married yesterday at Temple Emanu-El in New York by Rabbi Amy Ehrlich. The bride is the daughter of the late Mr. and Mrs. Bert M. Ward of New York. The bridegroom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Mandell of Chestnut Hill, Mass. The bride is a general partner of the New York investment banking firm of Lazard Freres & Co. She is a graduate of the City College of New York and of the Harvard-Radcliffe Program of Business Administration at Harvard University. Mr. Mandell, who is a private investor, has an undergraduate degree and an M.B.A. degree from Harvard. His previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bride's.
